cause.description:
Africa has been deseased by aids for how many years, there are orphans and war, it needs to be stopped, so mabey our government and the u.s president should get off there asses and help.
THINGS NEED TO GET DONE. PEOPLE NEED TO START HELPING.
1. All people should have a right for education.
2. No one should have a disease, and not know how they got it or what it does.
3. They need to be treated equaly, as we treat eachother equaly.
cause.mission: help raise money for the needs of african orphans.
cause.name: SAVE AFRICA .
